# ReadyStates

**Static Property**

A static property that allows you to access the Look Around ready-state enumeration.

## Declaration

```swift
static ReadyStates: typeof LookAroundReadyState;
```

## Discussion

For more information about the possible ready-state values that apply to Look Around views, see [doc://com.apple.mapkitjs/documentation/MapKitJS/LookAroundReadyState].
title: ReadyStates
